short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mark job ads on seek.co.nz and seek.com.au, filter ads based on your marks, add notes, manage marks, and export results as CSV.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your job search on seek.co.nz and seek.com.au online job portals with this powerful extension! Effortlessly mark job ads, filter them based on your custom marks, add notes to each listing, and manage your marked ads in a dedicated window. Export all your marked jobs and notes to a CSV file for easy sharing and further analysis. Simplify and streamline your job hunting process today!
